description:
A job brings Conan, Ran, and Kogoro to a resort area in Gunma Prefecture, where they run into Inspector Yamamura investigating a case. Inoue Kohei was murdered by Rube Goldberg Machine, a device made up of a chain reaction of many simple gimmicks.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ルーブ・ゴールドバーグマシン (前編)
